pr_title: Add send API for sending an iterable of events

timeline.message: Add send API for sending an iterable of events

timeline.bodyText: These need appropriate documentation of the exception that will be triggered, and any useful sample code.
timeline.author: JonathanGiles

replies.bodyText: Updated documentation and added sample code.
replies.author: srnagar

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/eventhubs/azure-messaging-eventhubs/src/main/java/com/azure/messaging/eventhubs/EventHubProducerClient.java b/sdk/eventhubs/azure-messaging-eventhubs/src/main/java/com/azure/messaging/eventhubs/EventHubProducerClient.java
index f5c913ee715..700fd8d9c64 100644
--- a/sdk/eventhubs/azure-messaging-eventhubs/src/main/java/com/azure/messaging/eventhubs/EventHubProducerClient.java
+++ b/sdk/eventhubs/azure-messaging-eventhubs/src/main/java/com/azure/messaging/eventhubs/EventHubProducerClient.java

@@ -201,6 +207,7 @@ public class EventHubProducerClient implements Closeable {
      *
      * @param events Events to send to the service.
      * @param options The set of options to consider when sending this batch.
+     * @throws AmqpException if the size of {@code events} exceed the maximum size of a single batch.
      */
     public void send(Iterable<EventData> events, SendOptions options) {
         producer.send(events, options).block();

timeline.message: Add code samples and update javadoc
